title: A new champion Idea!
body:
You should make a champion exactly like the old Fiora and call her Piora. 


It would be nice.

I think that would allow me to really enjoy the game like I used to.

replies.body:
I have a champion rework concept!

Delete Feedora from the game and remove her lore altogether.

I have a gamemode concept!

Delete Summoner's Rift and replace it with Twisted Treeline!
OK BOYS, GOT A GOOD IDEA FOR A ALF1 URF HEXAKILL(all together), BUT ON CRYSTAL SCAR (OLD) ANY THOTS?
